name: Grass Max
description: Multiplayer car fight with some of the fastest and frantic gameplay around.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7, 8, 10 64bit Processor: AMD Phenom 4X Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: Nvidia GTX 460 Network: Broadband Internet connection Storage: 3 GB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 10 64bit Processor: i7 2600k Memory: 8 GB RAM Graphics: Nvidia GTX 560 Network: Broadband Internet connection Storage: 3 GB available space

reviews.review_text: While this may seem like some old-fashioned car bumping game, it packs a lot of giggles when you play it.

What you have here is something no worth the time it takes to download. Collect more grass than the other players that is if you can find anyone else to join in a game. Buy this game and you will definitely get a refund.
